participant_1.background: i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. my favorite color is orange. i've a pet fish. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

participant_2.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i can sew my own clothes. i had cancer but its gone now. i am retired and living the great life. i do not have a smartphone.
